short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display lottery numbers and relevant ads

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Lotto PlusTT Number Generator is your reliable companion for viewing uniquely randomly generated lottery numbers that. Updated every minute, this extension provides fresh combinations while ensuring no duplicates appear.
Key Features:
Real-time Updates: Numbers refresh automatically every minute
Unique Combinations: No duplicate number sets
Clean Interface: Easy-to-read number display with a modern design
Powerball Format: 5 main numbers (1-35) + 1 powerball (1-10)
One-Click Refresh: Manually update numbers whenever you want
Minimal Permissions: Only requires access to display numbers

How It Works:
Opens in a compact popup window
Displays 5 unique number combinations
Shows a timestamp for the last update
Includes relevant lottery information and tips
Features a simple, user-friendly interface

Perfect For:
Quick number generation
Viewing multiple combinations at once
Real-time number updates
Regular lottery players
Anyone looking for random number combinations
Version: 1.0 Size: < 1MB Permissions: Minimal - only requires access to display the popup window
Note: This extension is for entertainment purposes only. Numbers are generated randomly and are not guaranteed to win.
